definition: to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

pinyin: ban4 dao3 ti3 tan4 ce4 qi4
ban4 dao3 ti3 chao1 dian3 zhen4

sentences.english: The present invention relates to methods and structures for the metallization of semiconductor devices.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及半導體器件的金屬化的方法和結構。

sentences.english: Semiconductor silicon is the most fundamental material for the microelectronic industry.
sentences.chinese: 半導體硅材料是微電子產業的基礎材料。

sentences.english: Media Tek and MStar Semiconductor initially launched the price war.
sentences.chinese: 聯發科和晨星半導體最早開打。

sentences.english: Silver-plated copper center conductor for smooth, detailed sound production.
sentences.chinese: 鍍銀中心銅導體的順利，詳細的生產。

sentences.english: Conductor screen is formed by extruded semi-conducting layer or wrapped with semi-conducting tapes and semi-conducting layer.
sentences.chinese: 絕緣採用超淨交聯聚乙烯絕緣料擠包在導體屏蔽上。

sentences.english: The sound of valves is inherently superior to that of any kind of semi-conductor.
sentences.chinese: 真空管的聲音比任何其他種類的半導體都要優越。

sentences.english: It is useful, for example, as an encapsulant for semiconductor products.
sentences.chinese: 例如，它用作半導體產品的密封劑。

sentences.english: The image method of conductor is popularized.
sentences.chinese: 將導體鏡象法推廣應用到介質。

sentences.english: Objective To study the nursing points of using semiconductor laser to cure early glottis cancer.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討半導體激光手術治療早期聲門癌的護理要點。

sentences.english: Due to the ohmic resistance in the conductor some energy were lost in transmission.
sentences.chinese: 由於歐姆電阻在導體一些能源在傳輸中丟失。

sentences.english: The present invention includes semiconductor constructions having trenched isolation regions.
sentences.chinese: 本發明包含具有帶溝槽隔離區的半導體構造。

sentences.english: And semiconductor laser non-scanning imaging system was focused on in the research.
sentences.chinese: 本論文主要對半導體激光非掃描成像系統進行了研究。

sentences.english: Envision the conductor as an assemblage of driven, damped oscillators .
sentences.chinese: 把導體看成是大量受迫阻尼振動的振子的集合。

sentences.english: In this paper, renormalization mass of the surface polaron in polar crystals were studied.
sentences.chinese: 討論了極性半導體中表面極化子重正化質量的性質。

definition: (of a sum of money etc) receivable
